example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تبين) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC شرط) (S-NOM (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاقلاع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاحلام)))))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مستحيل))))) (PUNC ")

arg.g: condition of giving up on dreams
